				<li style=""><a href="http://philadelphiazoo.org/Get-Involved/Ways-to-Support-the-Zoo/Make-Donation.aspx?campaign=1&url=annual-fund" style="" >Make a Donation</a></li>
				<li style=""><a href="/Get-Involved/Ways-to-Support-the-Zoo/Other-Ways-to-Help.htm" style="" >Other Ways to Help</a></li>
			</ul>
			</li>
			<li><a href="/Get-Involved/Community-Outreach.htm" >Community Outreach</a></li>

						<div id="textContainer">
							<div id="textContainerRelative">
							
								<div id="textContent">
									<h3>HOP ON OVER FOR EASTER BRUNCH</h3>
									<p>Celebrate the Easter season at the Zoo! Enjoy a delicious brunch buffet, pose for photos with Peter Cottontail, set out on an Easter egg hunt and more!</p>
									<p><a href='/Explore/Upcoming-Events/Easter-Bunny-Brunch.htm'>Learn More</a></p>
								</div>

								<div id="colorBox">
